column1: (Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 03 September 2023, for next 24hours)
Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at times  in  the  sea  areas off  the coast  extending  from
Puttalam to Hambantota via Colombo, Galle and Matara.
Winds will be south-westerly and speed will be (30-40) kmph.

W
ind speed may increase up to (50-60) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coast extending
from Trincomalee to Pottuvil via Kankasanthurai, Puttalam, Colombo, Galle and Hambantota.
The sea areas off the coast extending from Trincomalee to Pottuvil via Kankasanthurai, Puttalam,
Colombo, Galle and Hambantota will be rough at times.
Temporarily strong gusty winds and very rough seas can be expected during thundershowers.
